message: Ahhh, so handy: How to inspect an element that only appears when hovering over another element. http://stackoverflow.com/questions/24790002/inspect-elements-that-only-appear-on-hover (via @simevidas)
caption: Attachment UnavailableThis attachment may have been removed or the person who shared it may not have permission to share it with you.

data.message:
Thanks a lot for this post, It's very helpful :)
I remember I had to work with Glimpse profiling library, and it embed js script in the page to show statistics and it works by hovering over it but the data was too long and no scroll-bars available, so I had to try inspecting the elements but with no hope :D as it disappear each time you lose the focus !
He probably got this load of upvotes due to the gif :D
Doesn't firebug along with webinspector allow you to do this?
